Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc2047

package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc2047
RFC 2047 encoded word handling for MIME headers.

This package implements RFC 2047 (MIME Part Three: Message Header Extensions for Non-ASCII Text), enabling proper handling of non-ASCII characters in email headers.

Key Components

  • RFC2047Encoder - Encodes text into RFC 2047 format
  • RFC2047Decoder - Decodes RFC 2047 encoded words back to Unicode

Encoded Word Format

RFC 2047 encoded words have the format: 

=?charset?encoding?encoded_text?=

Where:

  • charset - Character set (e.g., UTF-8, ISO-8859-1)
  • encoding - Either B (Base64) or Q (Quoted-Printable)
  • encoded_text - The encoded content

Usage

This package is used internally when parsing email headers that contain non-ASCII characters, such as Subject lines, display names in address headers, and other structured header fields.

Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    RFC2047Decoder
    High-performance decoder for RFC 2047 encoded-words and RFC 2231 parameter encoding with support for: RFC 2047 encoded-words (=?charset?encoding?encoded-text?=) RFC 2231 parameter encoding (name*=charset'lang'%XX%YY...) Multiple character sets and encodings This implementation uses character-by-character parsing instead of regex for significantly better performance, especially for large headers.
    RFC2047Encoder
    High-performance RFC 2047 encoder for MIME header encoding.
